name: angelspetrochemNaOH
title: Angel's Petrochem NaOH
author: Baruk
description: This mod changes the Saline Water Electrolysis created by Arch666Angel. Now there is one step more to get solid Sodium Hydroxide: Sodium Hydroxide Solution. The ratio is 100 Saline Water to 25 Chloride, 25 Hydrogen and 50 Sodium Hydroxide Solution. The Sodium Hydroxide Solution can be clarified to avoid to store more and more Sodium (Hydroxide).
